products.title: Framed Buffalo Mini Pennants
products.description: IYKYK (and if you don't know, then you're probably not from Buffalo). Originally made as part of our collaboration with the Buffalo Bills as a limited release. But they've been so popular we've decided to keep these mini pennants as a permanent part of the collection! These framed mini pennants are also available loose. Currently the framing process takes approximately 10-15 business days Size: Roughly 16.5" x 16.5"

products.title: Let's Go Buffalo Pennant (Blue and Red)
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} Hey ey ey ey! Western New Yorkers know this one by heart. To celebrate the Buffalo Bills 2020 AFC East Division title and playoff run, we've updated our classic "Let's Go Buffalo" pennant. This special, limited edition design in official Bills colors matches our 40-foot pennants flying high at the top of Seneca One in Downtown Buffalo. If you'd like to print out the design of this pennant to color in, or hang in your window, download it here. Size: 9" x 27" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design Color: Blue
products.descriptionHtml:
Hey ey ey ey! Western New Yorkers know this one by heart. To celebrate the Buffalo Bills 2020 AFC East Division title and playoff run, we've updated our classic "Let's Go Buffalo" pennant. This special, limited edition design in official Bills colors matches our 40-foot pennants flying high at the top of Seneca One in Downtown Buffalo.


If you'd like to print out the design of this pennant to color in, or hang in your window, download it here.Â 

Size:Â 9" x 27"

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design

Color: Blue
